text.section: appropriate knowledge of technical terms commonly used in or related to auctioneering;
an understanding of the problems likely to be encountered in carrying out an auction;
appropriate reading comprehension, writing and spelling skills, knowledge of basic mathematics;

understanding of the types of misconduct for which disciplinary proceedings may be initiated against a state licensed auctioneer; provided, however, that an auctioneer licensed by the commonwealth as of July first, nineteen hundred and ninety-six shall retain such license.
